basicAuth.description: HTTP Basic Authentication. Works over HTTP and HTTPS

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Represents a list of records by given date (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: Represents a list of records by its value

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Represents a list of records by code of the country

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description: Represents a list of records by code of the destination

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Search by hotel name

parameters.name: next
parameters.description:
Next page cursor to use pagination. This field required after first page.
                        You can get the value of this variable from 'next' parameter in the response.

parameters.description: Bring only requesting fields for hotels. for example: code,name

master.description:
Master hotel code (hotels)
                                    This code refers to the master hotel code reachable only from 'hotels/deleted'
                                    table or action=deleted in API request.

name.description: Name of the hotel. For usage and display proposals, go to Convension Proposals section.

country.description: Country code of the hotels location (countries)

destination.description: Destination code of the hotels location (destinations)

latitude.description: Geographic coordinate latitude information that specifies the north-south position of hotels point on Earth's surface.

longitude.description: Geographic coordinate longitude information that specifies the north-south position of hotels point on Earth's surface.

currencycode.description: Currency code of the hotels used currency. Currency codes are global designators defined by ISO-4217.

hotel_type.description: Hotel Type code of the hotels type (hotel-types)

stars.description:
Hotels star rating (1 to 5) given by hotels local country authority. The source of star rating is hotelier and its local authority.
                                    Cosmos project doesn't have any star rating valuation process.

availability_score.description: This value give the availability score (0 to 1) for hotel and calculated by (hotel response count / hotel search request conut)

nr_rooms.description: Total number of rooms in the hotel

nr_restaurants.description: Total number of restaurants in the hotel

nr_bars.description: Total number of bars in the hotel

nr_halls.description: Total number of halls in the hotel

year_built.description: First built year of the hotel

themes.description: List of theme codes separated with comma, including themes which the hotel compromises (themes)

facilities.description: List of facility codes separated with comma, including facilities which the hotel compromises (facilities)

checkin_from.description: Earliest check in time in local. Formatted in ISO 8601 24h format HH:MM

checkout_to.description: Latest check out time in local. Formatted in ISO 8601 24h format HH:MM

updated_at.description: Latest update date and time of the hotel information.

chains.description: List of hotel chain codes separated with comma, including hotel chains which the hotel belongs to (chains)

language-country.description: Language and country information of hotel description content

hotel_information.description: Hotel information of the hotel providing overall, general important points about hotel such as history, architecture, view, outstanding features and important facilities such as spa, golf etc.

hotel_introduction.description: Hotel Introduction of the hotel providing brief information about the hotel with a sentence to give an overall impression of the hotel to the traveler at first sight.

location_information.description: Location information of the hotel providing where the hotel is located within the destination and some details on the neighborhood, transportation and statement  on how to get the hotel.

attraction_information.description: Attraction information of the hotel providing details on the tourist attractions, popular landmarks, important points such as places to visit around the hotel, near activities etc.

hotel_amenity.description: Hotel amenities details the facilities and services provided in public areas on the hotel promises including food&drink facilities, pool, entertainment areas, lobby features, reception services.

category.description: Image category code of the image (image-categories)

tag.description: Proposed text to be displayed in image alt tag including image information

original.description: URL address of the original photo. Not processed, original photo which hotelier provides.

thumbnail_images.description: Thumbnail image library of the hotel image.

large.description: Processed large version of the original image. Width of the image limited with 750 pixels. If the original image width is lower than 750 pixels, large field returns as 'null'

small.description: Processed small version of the original image. Width or height limited with 70 pixels by keeping aspect ratio constant.

mid.description: Processed middle version of the original image. Width limited with 160 pixels, height limited with 100 pixels by keeping aspect ratio constant.

name.description: Name of the destination. For usage and display proposals, go to Convension Proposals section.

country.description: Code of the country which the destination belongs to (countries)

regions.description: List of region codes separated by comma which the destination belogs to (regions)

latitude.description: Geographic coordinate of the destination centre that specifies north-south position of destinations point on the Earth's surface.

longitude.description: Geographic coordinate of the destination centre that specifies north-south position of destinations point on the Earth's surface.

updated_at.description: Latest update date and time of the destination.

name.description: Name of the region. For usage and display proposals, go to Convension Proposals section.

country.description: Code of the country which the region belongs to (countries)

kind.description: Kind of the region (possible contents are : province, state, island, other)

state_code.description: State code of the region. If region is not state, returns as 'null'.

updated_at.description: Latest update date and time of the region.

continent.description: Code of the continent which the region belongs to (continents)

updated_at.description: Latest update date and time of the country.
Latest update date and time of the hotel theme.
Latest update date and time of the hotel type.
Latest update date and time of the hotel chain.
Latest update date and time of the facility category.
Latest update date and time of the facility theme.
Latest update date and time of the facility scope.
Latest update date and time of the facility type.

facility_type.description: Code of the facility type which the facility meets (facility-types)

category.description: Code of the facility category which the facility meets (facilities/categories)

themes.description: List of theme codes separated by comma which the facility meets (facilities/themes)

scope.description: Code of the scope which the facility meets (facilities/scopes)

updated_at.description: Latest update date and time of the hotel theme.
Latest update date and time of the continent.
Latest update date and time of the room type
Latest update date and time of the meal type

code.description: Code of the image categoryCode of the room type

name.description: Name of the image categoryName of the room type

updated_at.description: Latest update date and time of the image categoryLatest update date and time of the room type
